reference.title: euare-accountaliascreate
reference.shortdesc: An account has two identifiers: a numeric ID and a human-readable alias. For a new account, the human-readable alias is the name given at the account's creation time. If you deleted your account alias, use this command to add a new one using your account's numeric ID.

row.entry: The new alias for the account.
This Eucalyptus extension is for use by the system administrator to act as the account administrator of the specified account without changing to account admininstrator's role.
